channel.title: Key D on Hansen's Songbook
channel.description: Recent content in Key D on Hansen's Songbook

item.title: The needle and the damage done
item.description: Intro: D D/C D/B D/Bb C C7 Esus4 E D D/C I caught you knockin' at my cellar door D/B D/Bb "I love you, baby. Can I have some more?" C F Esus4 E Ooh, ooh, the damage done I hit the city and I lost my band I watched the needle take another man Gone, gone, the damage done [Repeat Intro] I sing the song, because I love the man I know that some of you don't understand Milk-blood to keep from running out I've seen the needle and the damage done A little part of it in everyone But every junkie's like a settin' sun
